text: Isabelle Weingarten (18 April 1950 – 3 August 2020) was a French actress, model, and photographer. She was born in Paris. Her first movie role was in Four Nights of a Dreamer. She also starred in The Mother and the Whore in 1973. She began working for Cahiers du Cinéma in 1986. In 2008, she began studying the works of her father, Romain Weingarten, poet and playwright. Wiengarten was married to Benjamin Baltimore from 1968 to 1978. She then married Wim Wenders, who she divorced in 1983. Lastly, she was married to Olivier Assayas until their divorce in 1996. Weingarten died on 3 August 2020 at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French photographers Category:Models from Paris Category:Actors from Paris
title: Isabelle Weingarten
